attributes.action: Ban Tabacco Sales in Public Houses / Clubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To top the National No Smoking ban, Pubs, Clubs etc should be banned from selling all Tobacco products on the premises to patrons.
goverment royalties are too much at present from tobacco sales never mind giving them more, for what used to be a free country is a standing joke now, we should have done what France did to Brussels 4 years ago when they tried that on them.. tell them that we weren't going to stand for it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
